import sys

def main():
    answers = [0]*10001
    val = 0
    for i in xrange(1,10001):
        val += i/2
        answers[i] = val
    inp = [int(i.strip()) for i in sys.stdin.read().split()]
    out = ""
    t = inp[0]
    for _ in xrange(1,t+1):
        out+=str(answers[inp[_]])+"\n"
    print out[:-1]
main()
